channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 8th May
item.description:
police have stated customers are having issues with no signage up to state the road is closed. (from london road a40 up greenway lane and then realising they cant get through)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 8th May
item.description:
28 day with 3 way stop and go best out of hours carriageway pothole 1500x500x40mm tarmac patch required stats required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 8th May
item.description:
